en.banner: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.
en.heading: Submit a First-tier Tribunal form
en.body:
Use this service to upload and submit a completed First-tier Tribunal form. You'll also be asked to upload any supporting documents separately, so make sure you have everything you need to hand before getting started.

Submitting your form

As well as uploading a tribunal form, you will also be asked a handful of simple questions. You'll be able to review and change the answers you give to these questions before you submit them.

Uploading and submitting a tribunal form should not take longer than 20 minutes.
